q: Klaus Schwab said he doesn't think it will.`` I'm absolutely sure that the euro will not collapse because I think there is still a strong European solidarity in place,'' he told AP. Europe, in this new world that is coming up, if it wants to become a key actor and stay a key actor it has to express itself in terms of its unity and it has to make sure that euro is also secured by a much greater common effort, working together in fiscal monetary and general economic policies. sources said David Cameron gathered a few colleagues together to show his continuing support for Andy Coulson . No 10 is expected to organise a proper leaving party, which will be attended by David Cameron . One source said: It was not a big leaving do. It was a quiet goodbye with the prime minister. There will be a night out with Andy Coulson when colleagues can give him a present. Andy Coulson - who said on 21 January that he had decided to resign because the wave of allegations about illegal phone hacking meant he was unable to do his job- will not receive severance pay,.
